task.name: conjugatevis
task.shortdescription: Change the sign of the phases in all visibility columns.
task.description: Change the sign of the phases in all visibility columns.

param.name: vis
param.description:
Name of input visibility file Default: none
Example: vis='ngc5921.ms'

param.name: spwlist
param.description:
Spectral window selection Default:[] (all spws will be conjugated)
Example: spw=[1,2]

param.name: outputvis
param.description:
Name of output visibility file Default: 'conjugated_'+vis
Example: outputvis='conjugated.ms'

param.name: overwrite
param.shortdescription: Overwrite the outputvis if it exists?
param.description: Overwrite the outputvis if it exists? Default: False Options: False|True
